text: @MiaFarrow That's an inflated #. Actual COVID deaths are 45,632. Look for yourself on the CDC website. The 74K includes "presumed" and pneumonia deaths. MSM pumps the 74K to keep the fear up. Keep the shutdown going....trying to get to NOV. https://t.co/DaZ87BqrxL
